title: AI-Savvy Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
We're Hiring: AI-Savvy Virtual Assistant (Remote, Part-Time to Full-Time Potential)

Are you obsessed with the latest AI tools and GPT advancements? Do you love discovering ways to simplify, systematize, and scale businesses using automation and AI?

We're an AI-powered digital agency that helps holistic entrepreneurs and online business owners integrate AI into their marketing, content creation, and daily operations. Now we’re growing and looking for a tech-savvy, resourceful, and growth-minded Virtual Assistant to join our team.

???? Who We’re Looking For:
We want a right-hand partner who:

Is up-to-date on the latest AI tools (especially GPTs and automation platforms)

Can test, research, and implement tools that improve our workflow

Loves helping streamline processes and support our internal and client projects

Has excellent communication and is detail-oriented

Can manage AI-generated content, templates, workflows, and optimize client deliverables

? Must-Have Experience With (or a Deep Willingness to Learn):

ChatGPT (especially Custom GPTs + GPT Store navigation)

Notion AI for project management and automation

Zapier or Make (Integromat) for workflow automation

Descript or Castmagic for AI-powered audio & video processing

Trello / ClickUp / Slack for task management and team communication

HighLevel (GHL) integrations

Canva AI, Adobe Firefly, or other creative AI tools

Loom or other async video tools

Bonus: Prompt engineering, basic HTML/CSS, or experience building GPT bots

???? Your Role Will Include:

Researching & recommending new AI tools as they emerge

Setting up systems, workflows, and templates for the business and clients

Supporting with GPT implementation and client onboarding tasks

Assisting with AI-enhanced content generation and organization

Managing simple automation setups and improving team productivity

???? Requirements:

Strong interest in AI and emerging tech

Self-motivated, proactive, and solution-oriented

Fast learner and comfortable with evolving tools

Excellent written English and organizational skills

Reliable internet + consistent availability (must be responsive)

???? Hours & Pay:

Part-time to start with the potential to grow

Competitive pay based on experience and availability

???? How to Apply:
Reply with:

A short video (Loom or similar) introducing yourself and sharing why you love AI

A list of AI tools you’ve used and your favorite use cases

Resume or portfolio showing relevant experience

We’re building something innovative and impactful—and we’re looking for someone who wants to grow with us. If you're an AI enthusiast and a rockstar VA, we’d love to hear from you.

Let’s build the future together. ?????
